# Processed data

This is an interactive table of the covariate data.

```{r DataTable}
#----- import packages
library(DT)

#----- load DESeqDataSet
dds <- readRDS(subset(file_tab, step=="DESeq2" & extension=="deseq2.rds" & contrast=="all")$filename)

#----- create table
datatable(as.data.frame(colData(dds)), rownames=F, options = list(scrollX = TRUE))
```
